name: Golves
description:
- for Weekly Game Jam 116 - Crazy Golf -

golf balls that multiply...

use mouse to shoot all golf balls at once

esc to quit

get combos by scoring while the screen flashes

points multiplier drops each time you don't hit the hole

points multiplier drops to 1 if you lose all balls

frictionless super balls apear under certain circumstances

bounce a superball into the hole to breifly turn on the walls making it much safer to shoot quickly and get combos

its probably pretty buggy

made in clickteam fusion 2.5

i know the screenshot's on a mac but only the windows build is working right now

dx8 dx9 versions included although i don't know if it makes a difference here

i'll try to explain all this better tomorrow i really need to go to sleep now :)
